name: Ancestral Guardian
description: Barbarians who call on the spirits of their ancestors to protect allies and hinder foes.

3.name: Ancestral Protectors
3.description: When you rage, the first creature you hit on your turn has disadvantage on attacks against others, and those targets have resistance to its damage until your next turn.

6.name: Spirit Shield
6.description: While raging, you can use your reaction to reduce damage to a creature within 30 feet by 2d6, increasing at higher levels.

10.name: Consult the Spirits
10.description: You can cast augury or clairvoyance without a spell slot or components, summoning an ancestral spirit as the sensor. Once used, you must finish a short or long rest.

14.name: Vengeful Ancestors
14.description: When you use Spirit Shield, the attacker takes force damage equal to the damage prevented.

choices.name: Ancestral Guardian Feature
choices.description: Choose an option for the Ancestral Guardian subclass
